rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with Mediterranean tiled floors and archways.
Spacious living area with large windows for natural light; decorated in Mediterranean style with warm colors and stone accents.
Adjacent to the kitchen; features a wooden dining table with Mediterranean decor.
Functional open-plan kitchen integrating storage solutions and traditional Mediterranean design elements.
Small living area with a bedroom and adjoining bathroom for the household staff; designed keeping privacy in mind.
Storage area for cleaning supplies, extra utensils, etc.

openings.description: Large wooden door with iron fixtures, aligned as per Vastu principles.
Largely fenestrated openings for ample natural light while ensuring energy efficiency.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony overlooking the garden. Incorporates Vastu principles for peaceful sleep.
Four additional bedrooms designed to maximize space and privacy.
Main bathroom for the first floor with water-efficient fixtures.

openings.description: Large windows to promote natural ventilation, following Vastu guidelines.
Door leading to the garden balcony ensuring privacy and connection with nature.

rooms.description: A dedicated gym space on the roof terrace with ample ventilation and natural light.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring natural daylight in line with Mediterranean aesthetic.
Doorway to the private gym for easy access while maintaining privacy.
An open access to the large garden area.

rooms.description: Additional bedrooms for the servants ensuring privacy and functional living space.
Small bathroom attached to servant quarters.

openings.description: Natural light openings, considering Vastu principles for harmonious energy flow.
